isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CYLINDER HEAD AND/OR GASKET (I-6), REPLACE

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect batteries.
Drain engine coolant.
Raise front axle and support right side with stand. Remove right front tire.

note.para: This is done for access to cylinder head and clearance for lifting device.

step1.para: Remove surge tank and hoses, and surge tank mounting bracket.
Remove complete air filter assembly for improved access.
Remove upper radiator support strut rods.
Remove upper radiator hose.
Remove both charge air cooler pipes and hoses.
Remove engine fan blade/clutch assembly; use special tool.
Remove serpentine belt. Remove fan hub pulley for access.
Remove radiator shroud.
Disconnect alternator wiring. Disconnect alternator wiring harness and heater hose from support bracket at alternator. Remove bracket. Remove alternator.
Remove serpentine belt tensioner.
Remove alternator support bracket.
Inside the cab, remove complete engine cover.
Disconnect necessary sensors/sending units to remove wiring harness from valve cover. Remove harness from valve cover and lay aside for access.
Remove all fuel injector lines from injection pump and injectors as an assembly.
Remove aneroid line from valve cover and injection pump.
Remove fuel return lines from injectors and injection pump.
Remove all fuel injectors. Use special tool.
Remove oil lines at turbocharger.
Disconnect exhaust pipe at turbocharger.
Remove road draft tube from valve cover and crankcase.
Remove valve cover.
Loosen all rocker arm adjusting screw nuts and screws.

note.para: This is done to prevent possible valve train damage during installation.

step1.para: Remove rocker arm bracket/stand bolts (head bolts).

note.para: Loosen rocker arm bracket/stand bolts alternately to reduce chance of lever shaft binding.

step1.para: Remove rocker arm assembly from cylinder head.
Remove all push rods from cylinder head.
Remove remaining cylinder head bolts.
Install lifting device to cylinder head.
Remove cylinder head from crankcase.

note.para: Place the cylinder head on wood blocks to protect the valves and bottom deck surface.

step1.para: Clean all parts and mating surfaces; include clean nozzle bores.
If replacing cylinder head, transfer lifting brackets, thermostat housing, fittings and sensors. Transfer exhaust manifold with turbocharger. Torque bolts to specifications.
Install new cylinder head gasket to crankcase top deck. Install cylinder head to crankcase. Remove lifting device.
Lubricate the cylinder head bolt threads, washers and under seating area using clean engine oil.

note.para: Lubricate both long and short bolts.

step1.para: Install all short cylinder head bolts finger tight.
Install all push rods.
Install the rocker arm assembly onto cylinder head using the long head bolts in their respective holes.

Run the long cylinder head bolts in finger tight (except the two end bolts). Place a 0.005 in. feeler gauge between the outside brackets and the rocker levers to prevent binding. Finger tighten the remaining two end bolts.
Torque cylinder head bolts in three stages as outlined in service manual.

note.para: Check the two end rocker arms for freedom of movement after tightening the cylinder head bolts. Remove the two 0.005 in. feeler gauges.

step1.para: Adjust valve lash per service manual specification.
Install valve cover and gasket. Torque to specification.
Install road draft tube.
Using new seals, install fuel injectors.
Install fuel return lines.
Install aneroid line and torque to spec.
Install fuel injector line assembly, torque to specification.
Install alternator support bracket. Torque bolts to specification.
Install serpentine belt tensioner. Torque bolt to specification.
Install alternator and wire harness support bracket to alternator.
Connect wiring to alternator, sensors and sending unit. Connect heater hose. Connect wiring harness to valve cover.
Install radiator shroud.
Install serpentine belt. Install fan hub pulley. Torque bolts on pulley.
Install engine fan.
Install both charge air pipes and hoses.
Install upper radiator hose.
Install upper radiator support struts.
Install complete air filter assembly.
Install surge tank mounting bracket; install surge tank and hoses.
Install right front tire; torque lug nuts to specification. Remove stand.
Fill engine coolant.
Connect battery
Start engine, check operation, and check for leaks.
Inside the cab, install complete engine cover.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
Road test vehicle.
